credits.value: Lenovo thanks Enrique Nissim, Joseph Tartaro and Krzysztof Okupski from IOActive for reporting this issue.

description_data.value: A potential vulnerability in the LenovoFlashDeviceInterface SMI handler may allow an attacker with local access and elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

description.value: CWE-119 Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer

supportingMedia.value: Update system firmware to the version (or newer) indicated for your model in the Lenovo Product Security Advisory: https://support.lenovo.com/us/en/product_security/LEN-106014

solution.value: Update system firmware to the version (or newer) indicated for your model in the Lenovo Product Security Advisory:  https://support.lenovo.com/us/en/product_security/LEN-106014 https://support.lenovo.com/us/en/product_security/LEN-106014

description_data.value: A potential vulnerability in the LenovoFlashDeviceInterface SMI handler may allow an attacker with local access and elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.
